original_text: To further safeguard against such occurrences, a post-export differential integrity test will be run before any file is shared, comparing expected tenant data boundaries against the actual export contents.
units: To further safeguard against such occurrences

To further safeguard against such occurrences , a post - export differential integrity test will be run before any file is shared , comparing expected tenant data boundaries against the actual export contents .
comparing expected tenant data boundaries against the actual export contents
